productName: Aveeno Kids Sensitive Skin Face & Body Wash with Oat Extract, Gently Washes Away Dirt & Germs Without Drying, Tear-Free & Suitable for All Skin Tones, Hypoallergenic, 18 fl. Oz
productDetails: Brand: BABY BRAND, Item dimensions L x W x H: 7.3 x 0.3 x 15.8 centimetres, Scent: Unscented, Age range (description): Child, Skin type: Sensitive, Item package quantity: 1, Special features: Fragrance Free, Hypoallergenic, Item form: Gel, Material feature: Natural, Material type free: Sulfates

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for babies
reviews.body: I always like Aveeno body and hair wash for my kids. It's very good for delicate skin. It doesn't make the skin dry even.

The Aveeno Kids Sensitive Skin Face & Body Wash with Oat Extract is a gentle, effective solution for not only young children with delicate skin but adults as well. Its soap-free formula, enriched with soothing oat extract, cleanses without causing dryness or irritation. Parents will appreciate its hypoallergenic properties, ensuring it's safe for daily use on both the face and body. The light, natural scent is pleasant without being overpowering, making bath time enjoyable for kids. Overall, this product excels in providing a mild, nurturing wash that respects sensitive skin, maintaining Aveeno's trusted reputation in skincare.
It has pleasant smell and lathers well. Perfect for my son sensitive skin his skin feels so soft and hydrated. Definitely give it a tryüëçüèª
Best product, soft and gentle on skin

I'm extremely cautious about the products I put on my toddler's skin. He has sensitive skin that often can turn into eczema in the winter. His normal body wash was out of stock so I decided to give this a try! I'm super impressed with the amount of product you get for the price! The bottle is much bigger in person. The scent was very clean and mild. It also was very gentle on his skin and didn't cause any irritation or itching, which is a common problem he has with body wash. We may just make this our go-to bath time wash! Definitely would recommend.

The Aveeno Kids Sensitive Skin Face & Body Wash is fantastic! It's gentle on sensitive skin and effectively washes away dirt and germs without drying. The oat extract is soothing, and it's tear-free, making bath time easy. Suitable for all skin tones and hypoallergenic, it's perfect for kids. Highly recommend!

I‚Äôve always use Aveeno on myself because it‚Äôs good for sensitive skin and I was hoping it would work for my daughter with sensitive skin as well. Unfortunately, because it‚Äôs still scented I guess it‚Äôs still really bothered her. I had to go back to Eucerin baby.

I have tries so many different soaps after I stopped using this brand soap and now I‚Äôm back to it again because it does it‚Äôs job well for my daughter‚Äôs skin and she‚Äôs not itching from it like other soaps.

The only reason it gets a star knocked off is because it won't squirt out the last inch. And yes almost a full inch left in there and it won't pump. Both kids seem to be good with it and both have less skin issues since using it.

Aveeno Body Wash offers a gentle and nourishing cleanse, but if you‚Äôre expecting a rich lather, this might not be the product for you. While it doesn‚Äôt foam up as much as some other body washes, I‚Äôve found that it still effectively cleanses and leaves my skin feeling soft. If you prioritize a mild, hydrating wash over a bubbly lather, Aveeno Body Wash is worth considering for its soothing properties and skin-friendly ingredients

I've found Aveeno Kids Body Wash is not just for kids! It works great on Seniors sensitive skin. It's hypoallergenic, gently washes hands at the sink without drying out and chapping them. It also works great in the shower, having oat extract to clean without stripping the skin. Just lather and rinse. Works really well!

So my 7 year old started getting these bumps on his skin that I started noticing around his elbow/upper arms and his back/belly and thighs and I thought maybe he just has sensitive skin and needs a special body wash so I ordered this. Ever since we started using it, all the bumps are gone and have stayed gone. 10/10 will be buying again.

Plus my girls love the way it smells. We live in the country and are always outside, this cleanses well. Definitely recommend.
